questions.question:
Which device falls under output?:
printer · GPU · aspect ratio · Operating System

Laptops have a ___ that allows you to move the pointer without a physical mouse.
keyboard · navigator · trackpad · camera

Which of these units is the largest?
Gigabyte · Terabyte · Decabyte · Megabyte

Where might you still find magnetic tape drives in use?
In web servers · In your school computer · In archives · In your laptop
questions.answer: In archives. Tape drives are much cheaper per GB than cloud or hard disk backups. They also use less electricity than HDDs. Businesses backup important data on tapes.

questions.question:
Why do DVDs have vastly larger storage capacities than CDs?
Greater surface area · Both sides have data · They have 2 layers for recording data
questions.answer: They have 2 layers for recording data, storing either 4.7 or 8.5 GB (compared to CDs' 0.7 GB capacity)

questions.question:
Which of these is NOT a basic function of a computer?
Reading input · reading from/writing to storage · pondering its place and purpose in the universe
questions.answer: pondering its place and purpose in the universe

questions.question:
Which of these devices falls under input?
magnetic disk · camera · GPU · CPU

A monitor's height:width is called what?
aspect ratio · contrast ratio · viewing angle · response time

A(n) ___ scanner uses radio frequencies to read the data stored in special tags.
RFID · LDAP · Trackpad · Ethernet

Why do SSDs tend to cost more than HDDs?
keep data more secure · have greater storage capacity · faster for reading/writing
questions.answer: SSDs are faster than HDDs for reading and writing information.

questions.question:
Another name for a folder is:
file path · directory · partition · C: drive

A(n) ___ allows users to interact with the computer via graphical elements.
Operating System · GUI · terminal · SSD

Preparing a device so that an OS can be installed is called:
GUI · formatting · compression · encryption

This type of diagram helps programmers chart out the steps of an algorithm.
organizational chart · venn diagram · flowchart · treemap

Why might NTFS be preferred over the FAT file system for main storage?
it's more powerful, secure · it's universal · it's faster
questions.answer: NTFS is more powerful and secure than FAT. FAT, however, is more universal (USB drives and SD cards often use it).

questions.question:
Which operating system is created by Google?
MacOS · Drive · ChromeOS · Windows 11

Windows' file manager is called ____.
File Explorer · Microsoft Store · Edge · Start Menu

What manages the communication between hardware and software in a computer?
boot menu · operating system · GUI · ALU

This method "squeezes" data so that it takes up less space on a hard drive.
encryption · decryption · formatting · compression

If you wanted to run a Linux environment on top of MacOS or Windows, what technology could you use?
Microsoft 365 · V-sync · virtual machine · GPU

final-jeopardy.question: What number of megabytes, actual or approximate, are contained in one gigabyte?
